errors.error_description: The instructions incorrectly tell the user to run `pytest` before starting the required OpenReview API and web services, which will cause all tests to fail as they cannot connect to the backend.
correction_candidates:
Once all three services are running, start the tests:
```bash
pytest
```
Run pytest after starting the OpenReview API V1, API V2, and Web services.
Start the OpenReview services and then run pytest in a separate terminal.
Before running pytest, ensure the OpenReview services are active on ports 3000, 3001, and 3030.
errors.golden_answer:
Once all three services are running, start the tests:
```bash
pytest
```
